EmailTemplate.description: Auto-notification sent to Central Ops when 2 weeks have elapsed from contacting parents re failed payment
EmailTemplate.name: Failed payment next steps
EmailTemplate.subject: 2nd payment reminder has been sent for {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Two weeks have elapsed since contact was made with PG regarding failed payment for {!Contact.Name}. Please move {!Contact.Name} from either assigned/reserved or paid waiting list to bottom of unpaid waiting list and send email to PG to confirm action.
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever 14 days have elapsed from contacting PG regarding failed payment.
